item.title: Chrome Dev Tools – A primer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Anyone who has developed a web application has experienced to some extent the magic of JavaScript. With the growing complexity of web applications the process of finding and solving problems has grown quite complex. On the other hand, different tools have emerged to help tackle such problems. This talk will present Chrome Developer Tools through […]
item.content:encoded:
Anyone who has developed a web application has experienced to some extent the magic of JavaScript. With the growing complexity of web applications the process of finding and solving problems has grown quite complex. On the other hand, different tools have emerged to help tackle such problems.
This talk will present Chrome Developer Tools through practical examples and advice necessary for developing Web applications.
